channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for VT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for VT

item.title: Report E-2023060809
item.description:
Report E-2023060809

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-20T21:09:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-01
  • City: FERRISBURG
  • State: VT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: KAG MERCHANT GAS GROUP, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: The rear axle of the trailer overheated causing a fire which spread to the tires. The fire could not be extinguished and it burnt the sides of the trailer engulfing the trailer in fire. The fire spread to the tractor and it also burned. The fire on and under the trailer heated the fire protection system in the trailer causing it to trigger. The fire protection system is intended to release the contents of the trailer to the atmosphere to prevent rupture of the pressure vessels. The gas vented to the atmosphere and ignited from the nearby fire for approximately 45 minutes.
